dict.acceptation: 能干的；有才能的；有才华的；能胜任的；

sent.orig: Man, the trouble-maker of the network ethic problem, is also capable of solving the very problem.
sent.trans: 人既是网络道德问题的创造者，也是网络道德问题的解决者。

sent.orig: Because I'm capable of more responsibilities, so I decided to change my job.
sent.trans: 因为我有能力担负起更多的责任，所以决定换工作。

sent.orig: We need capable and experienced hands. Ideas just don't accomplish themselves.
sent.trans: 我们需要有能力和经验的老手，只有想法并不能成事。

sent.orig: This is a capable and vigorous army.
But also some Beijing people are very capable of handling suffering, and they are competent.
sent.trans: 但也有一部分北京人非常能吃苦，非常能干。
